member.name: P:Loxodon.Framework.Asynchronous.AsyncResult.IsCancelled
member.summary: Returns "true" if this task was cancelled before it completed normally.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Asynchronous.AsyncResult.Cancel
member.summary: Attempts to cancel execution of this task. This attempt will fail if the task has already completed, has already been cancelled, or could not be cancelled for some other reason.If successful, and this task has not started when "Cancel" is called, this task should never run.
member.exception: If not supported, throw an exception.

member.summary: Creates and executes a task that becomes enabled after the given delay.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Execution.IScheduledExecutor.Schedule(System.Action,System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates and executes a one-shot action that becomes enabled after the given delay.
member.param: millisecond

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Execution.IScheduledExecutor.Schedule(System.Action,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Creates and executes a one-shot action that becomes enabled after the given delay.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Execution.IScheduledExecutor.ScheduleAtFixedRate(System.Action,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given period; that is executions will commence after initialDelay then initialDelay+period, then initialDelay + 2 * period, and so on.
member.param: millisecond
millisecond

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Execution.IScheduledExecutor.ScheduleAtFixedRate(System.Action,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given period; that is executions will commence after initialDelay then initialDelay+period, then initialDelay + 2 * period, and so on.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Execution.IScheduledExecutor.ScheduleWithFixedDelay(System.Action,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given delay between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next.
member.param: millisecond
millisecond

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Execution.IScheduledExecutor.ScheduleWithFixedDelay(System.Action,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Creates and executes a periodic action that becomes enabled first after the given initial delay, and subsequently with the given delay between the termination of one execution and the commencement of the next.

member.summary: Load the preferences from the local file system.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Prefs.Preferences.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a string value from the preferences. The method returns null if the key is not found.
member.param: The name of the preference to retrieve
member.returns: Returns the preference value if it exists, or defaultValue. Throws Exception if there is a preference with this name that is not a string.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Prefs.Preferences.GetString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a string value from the preferences. The method returns defaultValue if the key is not found.
member.param: The name of the preference to retrieve
Value to return if this preference does not exist
member.returns: Returns the preference value if it exists, or defaultValue. Throws Exception if there is a preference with this name that is not a string.

member.name: M:Loxodon.Framework.Prefs.Preferences.SetString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set a string value in the preferences
member.param: The name of the preference
The new value for the preference
